job_tasks.phrase: design, develop, test, secure & deploy services from planning to production
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the end-to-end software development lifecycle, including design, development, testing, security, and deployment.

job_tasks.phrase: Practice all software development life cycles in agile oriented environment
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions practicing software development life cycles within an agile framework.

job_tasks.phrase: Design and implement the infrastructure of the system.
job_tasks.justification: This refers to the design and implementation of system infrastructure, a core part of software development, especially in cloud-native environments.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop and deploy machine learning models and AI algorithms to extract insights, automate tasks, and improve decision-making processes.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly mentions the development and deployment of machine learning models and AI algorithms.

job_tasks.phrase: Optimize application performance, scalability, and cost efficiency through continuous monitoring and optimization of serverless resources.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves optimizing and monitoring applications in production, which falls under operations and maintenance.

job_tasks.phrase: Participate in continuous and iterative engineering cycles with an emphasis on code quality, supportability, scalability, and performance.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights participation in iterative engineering cycles focused on essential software engineering quality attributes.

soft_skills.phrase: The team works in full collaboration with security architects, product managers, and other development teams.
Provide technical leadership and mentorship to junior team members, sharing knowledge and best practices to foster a culture of learning and innovation.
Explore new technologies and tools to keep us using cutting-edge solutions
produce complex and advanced platforms that meet the highest security standards and NFRs.

classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes the development and deployment of machine learning models and AI algorithms, along with the full software development lifecycle. While it mentions AI algorithms, the core focus is on building and deploying these models within a broader software engineering context rather than solely on advanced generative AI techniques.
